data.title: Annie and Her Men Multiple Choice Quiz
data.meta_description: Annie sure had her fair share of men in Pine Valley. Answer these ten questions about them! Good luck! All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Annie's first boyfriend in town was Ryan Lavery. However, sometime in the Fall of 2006, she shot him at what location?

Answer: Ryan's penthouse

Annie arrived in town after fleeing her abusive ex-husband, Terry McDermott, and sought shelter at Ryan's penthouse. Annie had actually known Ryan's sister, Erin, since she aided Annie by helping her evade Terry. One day, Ryan opened the door to his penthouse but Annie, suspecting at that moment that her ex-husband tracked her down, shot him in the chest.

2. In May of 2007, Ryan and Annie exchanged vows at a lavish wedding at Wildwind. However, Greenlee attempted to stop the ceremony. Who prevented her from doing this?

Answer: Kendall Hart

Ryan proposed marriage to Annie in early 2007 and she accepted with much exuberance. The two arranged for lovely nuptials at the Wildwind estate but Greenlee had other plans. Having just returned to town, she raced over to try and put a kibosh on the wedding but Kendall locked her in a shed.

3. Adam and Annie became a couple after she helped him out on the night that he shot Stuart. Where did they marry in November of 2009?

Answer: Chandler Mansion

Adam became smitten with Annie during the period of when he was distraught after Stuart's shooting. Once Adam realized that he was the one who put a bullet in his own twin brother, he understood why Annie helped him out, as she knew the truth would pain him. The two married at Chandler Mansion in November of 2009 but divorced within their first year.

4. In September of 2009, Annie got cozy with Adam and spoke about their future nuptials. She mentioned having a dream of where he would slide off her ankle bracelet at the wedding and toss it and hit who in the head?

Answer: Ryan Lavery

There was one instance in September of 2009 when Annie made a funny joke with Adam. She brought up a dream she had of where they were getting married and got to the part where the groom slips off the bride's garter. However, as Annie was on house arrest at that time, she stated that Adam would instead remove her ankle bracelet, throw it and hit Ryan in the head. Annie smiled at how wonderful that dream seemed to her.

5. Adam was not the only Chandler man who Annie romanced. From mid to late 2010, she wooed both JR and Scott. She elected to marry Scott and did so in August of 2010 at what location?

Answer: The park

Annie got involved in her own personal love triangle when JR and Scott vied for her love. However, she chose Scott to marry in the Summer of 2010 and the two arranged for a small, private wedding at the park. They said their "I Dos" with Emma in attendance.

6. Scott filed for divorce from Annie after he caught her sleeping with JR.

Answer: True

Scott and Annie's wedded bliss did not last for long since it was apparent that Annie had a huge attraction to his cousin, JR. During their short marriage, JR and Annie constantly met with each other and one day could not resist their passion anymore.

They hit the sheets only for Scott to catch them in the moment. He immediately filed for divorce and their union dissolved in November of 2010.

7. In the middle of 2009, Annie and Aidan became boyfriend and girlfriend. He helped her out a lot after she had hallucinations involving her childhood friend, Tori. It was revealed that which person killed Tori?

Answer: Richie Novak

Aidan promised to be there for Annie as she struggled with her emotional breakdown, which required her to undergo psychiatric treatment at Oakhaven. After Annie was assigned a new doctor, due to Dr. Sinclair's acts of revenge against her, she and Aidan forged a romantic bond. Aidan was instrumental in helping Annie realize that the person she thought she saw at Oakhaven, Tori, was actually deceased.

After conducting research, Aidan realized that Tori was Annie's best friend during her youth and her demented brother, Richie, murdered her.

8. Annie had numerous sparks and immense chemistry with JR. In April of 2010, she threatened to reveal to which person that they had a one night stand if he tossed her out of Chandler Mansion?

Answer: Marissa Tasker

JR and Annie spent the night together in April of 2010 when JR was still romantically involved with Marissa. At this point, JR wanted nothing more than to get rid of Annie but she had something up her sleeve. She promised JR that she would blab to Marissa about their night together had he followed through on his promise to kick her out of the home.

Despite this friction, JR and Annie would soon fall in love.

9. In early 2011, Annie became frustrated when JR halted resuming his relationship with her. This caused Annie to start going crazy again and, on numerous occasions, she had hallucinations of which person taunting her?

Answer: Marissa Tasker

Annie wanted nothing more than to get back together with JR despite all the instances of when he put off being her boyfriend again. This drove Annie into a fragile mental state, accompanied by depression and hallucinations of Marissa. During one said hallucination, she careened into an ambulance operated by Cara Castillo.

10. Annie made a short term return from late July to early August of 2011. During this time, she and JR reconnected.

Answer: False

Annie appeared again in scenes which took place at Oakhaven in the Summer of 2011. After she escaped from the institution, she headed straight to Ryan's penthouse for a visit with Emma. However, she and JR did not reconnect during this time despite their still loving each other.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
